samahara deshapalakayan koti prakoti mudal hamba karamin surasapa windina wita mewan minisun sitima apa siyalu dena agaya kala yuthuya.owayis mohomad imithiyas 2016 warshaye kolambaa nagarasabhawe pawathwu uthsawayakata paminimata awashya andum miladi ganne thamage birindage karabu ukas karamini.me wanawita ohu pathwa athi thathwaya itha kedaniya we.hari aakara rakiyawak nomathiwa jiwath wimata geyak nomathiwa kuli niwasaka jiwath wemin 2006-2009 kolambaa nagaradhipathi pradarshanaya karanne ohu ratata ithiri kala mudalayi.ohu mahajana mudal gasa ka wanam ada ohu ta mewan iranamak ath nowanu atha.balaya pasupasa hathi wati pissu ballan men duwana deshapalakayanta owayis mohomad purwadarshayaki.horun dil karuwan nowa mewan janatha hithawadi nayakayan shri lankawata awashya kalaya udawi atha.
